00210 inline bool CaloHitMetadata::IsCaloHitAvailable(CaloHit *const pCaloHit) const
00211 {
00212     CaloHitUsageMap::const_iterator usageMapIter = m_caloHitUsageMap.find(pCaloHit);
00213 
00214     if ((m_caloHitUsageMap.end()) == usageMapIter || !usageMapIter->second)
00215         return false;
00216 
00217     return true;
00218 }
00219 
00220 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00221 
00222 inline StatusCode CaloHitMetadata::SetCaloHitAvailability(CaloHit *const pCaloHit, bool isAvailable)
00223 {
00224     CaloHitUsageMap::iterator usageMapIter = m_caloHitUsageMap.find(pCaloHit);
00225 
00226     if (m_caloHitUsageMap.end() == usageMapIter)
00227         return STATUS_CODE_NOT_FOUND;
00228 
00229     usageMapIter->second = isAvailable;
00230 
00231     return STATUS_CODE_SUCCESS;
00232 }
